sense.def:
To converse with someone
pomeni govoriti z nekom;

seg.quote: I consider it a privilege to have conversed with you.
After the meeting, members conversed in small groups.

sense.def:
The converse of a statement or fact
je nasprotje neke trditve ali dejstva ali njegova obrnjena oblika. Na primer
the converse of
‘investment stimulates growth’
je
‘growth stimulates investment’
.

seg.quote: Political power is used to win economic power. But the converse process is just as common.
You can use beer yeast for bread-making. Conversely, you can use bread yeast in beer-making.
